info.title: Genmo API
info.description: API for video generation and processing

post.summary: Create a new video generation task
post.description: Initiates a new video generation task based on the provided prompt

prompt.description: Text prompt describing the video to generate

webhookUrl.description: Optional webhook URL for status updates

taskId.description: ID of the created generation task

statusUrl.description: URL to check the status of the generation

x-codeSamples.source:
from genmo_api import GenmoAPI

client = GenmoAPI()
video_task = client.video_tasks.create(
    prompt="prompt",
)
print(video_task.status_url)

get.description: Retrieve the current status of a video generation task

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: The ID of the task to check

resultUrl.description: URL of the generated video (when completed)

error.description: Error message if the task failed

lastStatusAt.description: Timestamp of the last status update

x-codeSamples.source:
from genmo_api import GenmoAPI

client = GenmoAPI()
status = client.video_tasks.status.retrieve(
    "taskId",
)
print(status.id)

from genmo_api import GenmoAPI

client = GenmoAPI()
client.update_status()

from genmo_api import GenmoAPI

client = GenmoAPI()
client.process()

post.description: Deliver webhook for task status updates

taskId.description: ID of the task to deliver webhook for

x-codeSamples.source:
from genmo_api import GenmoAPI

client = GenmoAPI()
response = client.webhook_deliveries.deliver(
    task_id="taskId",
)
print(response.delivered)

from genmo_api import GenmoAPI

client = GenmoAPI()
response = client.handle_successful(
    result_url="resultUrl",
    task_id="taskId",
)
print(response.message)

from genmo_api import GenmoAPI

client = GenmoAPI()
client.internal.update_status()

from genmo_api import GenmoAPI

client = GenmoAPI()
client.internal.process()

post.description: Deliver webhook for task status updates

taskId.description: ID of the task to deliver webhook for
